title: Episode 197: Understanding the Gender Pay Gap Pt. 1
itunes:title: Episode 197: Understanding the Gender Pay Gap Pt. 1
description:
In part 1 of this two-part episode, Steve Horwitz joins us to discuss the realities and myths surrounding gender discrimination and the gender pay gap.

Get Your Copy of Cooperation and Coercion Now!

http://www.cooperationandcoercion.com

Topic of the Week

https://www.amazon.com/Steven-Horwitz/e/B001JP8I1I

Lawsuits under the equal pay act

https://www.eeoc.gov/statistics/eeoc-litigation-statistics-fy-1997-through-fy-2019

https://fred.stlouisfed.org/series/LNS14000001
